academiadates 0.0.0.9000

Represent year-trimester

Source: R/yeartrimester.R
year-trimester.Rd

Create or coerce using yeartrimester().

Usage

yeartrimester(x, academic_start = 1)

make_yeartrimester(year = 1970L, trimester = 1L, academic_start = 1)

is_yeartrimester(x)

academic_year(x)

Arguments

x

A date.

academic_start

A numeric indicating the starting month of the academic year.

year, trimester

A vector of numerics which give year and trimester values.

Value

A year-trimester (yeartrimester) object.

Display

Use format() to display yeartrimester objects in desired format.

Examples


# `academic_year()` helps to extract academic year
y <- yeartrimester(as.Date("2020-06-01"), academic_start = 6)
academic_year(y)
#> [1] 2021
lubridate::year(y) # calendar years
#> [1] 2020
